hero.title: TECNOLEED
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Agricultural Exports

welcome.title: Welcome to Tecnoleed
welcome.description: We specialize in exporting high-quality agricultural products from Egypt to the world

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: Tecnoleed is a premier agricultural export company with years of experience in sourcing and distributing the finest agricultural products. We pride ourselves on our commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction in every aspect of our business

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to bridge the gap between local farmers and global markets by providing premium, sustainably-sourced agricultural products. We maintain the highest standards of quality, ensuring that our customers receive only the best while supporting sustainable farming practices worldwide

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Discover our premium selection of agricultural products

dates.title: Medjool Dates
dates.description: Premium quality Medjool dates, known for their exceptional sweetness and size

oliveOil.title: Olive Oil
oliveOil.description: Pure and authentic olive oil from the finest Egyptian olives

strawberry.title: Frozen Strawberry
strawberry.description: Fresh frozen strawberries, preserving their natural taste and nutrients

tomatoPaste.title: Tomato Paste
tomatoPaste.description: Rich and concentrated tomato paste made from fresh tomatoes
